metadata.executiveSummary: This is a summary of the full Equalities Impact Assessment conducted on the Best Start Grant to accompany The Early Years Assistance (Best Start Grants) (Scotland) Regulations 2018.The Scottish Government is committed to replacing the UK Government's Sure Start Materntiy Grant with the Best Start Grant, a new, expanded benefit to provide financial support to lower income families during a child's early years.
metadata.description: Equality Impact Assessment considering the potential effects of the Best Start Grant and how it impacts on people with one or more protected characteristics.
metadata.keywords: Social Security; Best Start Grants; Equality Impact Assessment; Early Years Assistance; Regulations
